name: @secure-messenger/workspace
description: Secure Messenger Workspace - Web MVP with Electron Migration Path

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:web && npm run build:backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.install:packages: cd packages/shared && npm install && cd ../web-app && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:packages && npm run clean:node-modules
scripts.clean:packages: cd packages/shared && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../web-app && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../backend && rm -rf dist node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:web && npm run lint:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:web
scripts.prepare:electron: npm run build && npm run setup:electron
scripts.electron:init: cd packages/electron-app && npm init -y && npm install electron --save-dev

author: Secure Messenger Team
